reviewText:
This season had some of the Best Guest stars, Victoria's mom (Carol Burnett), Melanie's Boss (Heather Locklear, Jay Harrington), Jesse Tyler Ferguson, Georgia Engel, Tim Conway, Mary Tyler Moore, Valerie Harper, Cloris Leachman, and many, many more.
  I am Betty White's biggest fan, and I can honestly say that this season is by far my favorite. The Mary Tyler Moore Reunion was the icing on the cake!! This DVD set includes all 24 Episodes on 3 discs. Get it!!! I haven't seen comedy this good in a long time!

A delightful season with these talented and charming actresses. The writing is superb. The episodes are subtitled. Description says wide screen but the format nearly fills up my television screen. I'm very happy with this purchase!
these girls are always great
This season includes the great reunion episode with the great MTM gals!  So wonderful.
Completing my collection - love Hot in Cleveleland
DVD was great, thanks
Love this show! great laughs.
I love this show. The writing is great. The cast just seems to fit together.
all seasons are must own, outstanding, wonderful series
These 4 just get funnier and more fabulous! I love this chemistry they have on screen and would love to see it stay on air forever!
LOVE BETTY!
Love :)
Funny Funny show
Love, love, love this show,  Cast is fantastic,  Interesting guest stars. too
Funny---funny--
purchased all 5 seasons I find it funny, love all the girls acting
Love it!
love the show
This show always made me laugh out loud. LOVE added bloopers!  The cast is perfect.  Betty White still on her A game!!
:Love this show, sorry it no longer be shown.  Therefore I had to buy the sets to make sure I could watch anytime I wanted.
always loved Betty White and will watch anything she is in now waiting for season 6 and the final one so I can order
Ok
This is my favorite show and I hate it see it ending
Very funny show, love it !!!

Wife has enjoyed all the seasons of Hot in Cleveland. The producers etc did a good job of putting together the actresses & their supporting actors for this show. It is a pity that those same people have chosen to put an end to the series after their '6th Season' finishes.
This is some of the funniest comedy I have ever seen. Worth seeing from the beginning. Great writing and excellent cast of characters. Well done.
I'm an avid TV watcher and this series is one of my favorites. I had to have it for my DVD collection.
All episodes run continuously so you don't have to tend to the DVD player
Great
It's a great show with high quality comedy, and the best actors! I mean, who doesn't love Betty white???
Awesome TV show. All 4 women are fantastic. The best part of season 4 was the Mary Tyler Moore reunion.

When we last left the ladies in Season 3, Elka (Betty White) had a fling with Pierre (Regis Philbin). The ladies find a happy baby on their doorstep. Starring Valerie Bertinelli, Jane Leeves, Wendie Malick and Betty White. Betty White is the age of 90 to 91. Season Four: November 28, 2012 - February 13, 2013, June 19, 2013 - September 4, 2013. Guest stars: 1. Regis Philbin, Michael McMillian, Heather Locklear, Jay Harrington. 2. Heather Locklear, Jay Harrington. 3. Jay Harrington, Alan Dale. 4. Georgina Engel, Pat Harrington. 5. Georgina Engel, Eddie Cibrian, Fred Willard. 6. Eddie Cibrian, Georgia Engel, Jay Harrington, heather Locklear. 7. Alan Ruck, Juliet Mills, Michael McMillian. 8. Georgina Engel, Alan Dale, Jay Harrington. 9. Alan Dale. 10. Jay Harrington, Cameron Mathison. 11. Georgina Engel, Ed Begley Jr, Kevin Farley. 12. Alan Dale, Jay Harrington, Dave Foley. 13. LIVE Episode: Shirley Jones, William Shatner. 14. Jean Smart, Carol Burnett, Tim Conway. 15. Alan Dale, Jay Harrington. 16. Dave Foley, Wally Kurth, Eddie Cibian. 17. Jay Harrington. 18. Tom Arnold, Jack Wagner. 19. "Look Who's Hot Now" with Kirstie Alley. 20. Parvesh Cheena. 21. Georgina Engel. 22. Enrico Colantoni, Jeffrey De Serrano. 23. Georgina Engel, George Hamilton, Valerie Harper, Cloris Leachman, Mary Tyler Moore. 24. Craig Ferguson, Alan Dale. English language only. Option of subtitles in English. In-show advertising: Joy dish liquid, PetSmart, Nationwide Insurance, Cosmopolitan. Valerie Bertinelli and Pat Harrington worked together on One day At A Time (1975-84). Betty White was a guest on The Carol Burnett Show (1967-78) in 1875, 1876 and also with Tim Conway in 1978. Betty White and Carol Burnett also worked together on Eunice (1982) and Mama's Family in 1983 as guests. Mary Tyler Moore, Cloris Leachman, Valerie Haprer, Georgia Engel and Betty White have all worked together on Mary Tyler Moore Show (1970-77). Hot in Cleveland: Season 1 (2010). Hot in Cleveland: Season 2 (2010-11). Hot in Cleveland: Season 3(2011-12). Hot In Cleveland: Season 4 (2012-13). Hot in Cleveland: Season Five (2014). Hot In Cleveland: Season 6 begins March 18, 2015 on TV Land. It is the last season.
Great show and cast. Will truly miss it when it concludes.
love it.
Excellent
Hope Betty White last forever, and the rest of the crew
Thank you.
Great show sorry to see it end after this season which is #6
Hot In Cleveland is probably the best undiscovered show.  VERY, VERY funny.
I just love this show!! I have all seasons and waiting for 6. The chemistry between these women is great. Betty White is classic especially at her age which doesn't stop her from having fun!
Fantastic show!
Very funny
Great show fast shipping

IN MY humble, unprofessional opinion each of these actresses is a star in her own right but the humor isn't as striking as in Frasier,  Golden Girls, Harry's Law and others. .I have watched all the seasons because I like each actress and I keep wanting to see the show come together humor-wise. I especially love Jane Leeves and Betty White.  But if Betty White weren't in this show, even with the other three leading ladies, I don't think it would have made it through the first season. To me, the writing just isn't there.  But I'm very glad the show is experiencing as much success as it is, for the sake of everyone involved in it.  I am JUST a viewer and a fan of the four stars, obviously, not a professional anything. This is just my response to the show.
Great.
HIC is always a winner!  Anything Betty White does is a hit with me.  The chemistry between the characters works well and the stories keep me smiling and often laughing!
funny!
Great funny series because of the chemistry between the four women.
Love this series! Betty White is just plain funny and awesome.
Funny show cant wait for next season
love it
One of the best comedy shows on tv
Who doesn't love Betty White?
Love love love this series.  All actresses are exceptional in their roles and really love the "special guest appearances".

One of the best shows I've known.
I like all the characters and how they tie to each other.
I love watching them after work when I get home, it helps me relax and have a good laugh!
good
Very Funny.
Good acting as always, but discs came in a plastic disc cover that was falling a bit apart.  Love the Susan Lucci episode!
I don't watch this show on tv but I love getting the DVDs and watching it.
This came in very condition.  I love this Hot In Cleveland series!
like this show and have them all
This show just gets better each year and has so many great guest stars.
These shows are consistently FUNNY!!!!!!!!!  Nice to have handy so I can watch on my schedule, especially when nothing of interest on antenna tv.
Love this show
funny stuff great actresses
Love this show. Arrived on time and as described! Would purchase from this seller again in the future.
Great series!!  Great laughs and great cast!
Love Hot in Cleveland!!  Enjoy watching the shows again & again.  Arrived quickly and in great condition.
This is one of the most funniest sitcoms with all of my favorites actors/actresses.  I really like the variety of guest stars throughout the seasons.
Hot in Cleveland is awesome, I never miss a show. Betty, Wendie, Jane and Valerie are truly great. I love those ladies they are hilariously funny and they are great together.
I ALWAYS watch Hot in Cleveland, so I've purchased each season it's been on.  Took the DVD's along when the "girls" and I went on vacation, and they loved it!  Wonderful cast and lots of laughs!
One of the best comedy shows of all time......perfect chemistry between these women with Betty White leading the way............5 STARS
Very pleased

Loved it. Its a must see. Love all the girls.
John Aguilera. Betty White is fantastic. Jane and Valerie are hysterical. And last but not last Wendie is fantabulous.
It is just as funny as the first season, these four ladies together are so incredible I wish it was on longer.

Betty White steals the show on Hot in Cleveland!  It is full of laughs and definitely one of my favorite shows on TV!  Added bonus is that they make fun of Cleveland all the time, which having lived there and hated it, I love!
If you liked the first 3 seasons then you will also enjoy season 4. wanted to watch it all in one day but couldn't . get show. hope Betty White lives forever. lol.
The DVDs were advertised as Used - Like New.  However, two of the DVDs were very scratched.  I was disappointed.
Just great. I enjoy this show and highly recommend it. It has me entertained and have watched the whole season about 3 times since I received it.

I enjoyed this season as much as all the previous ones. A few characters are great addition: Mamy Sue and Alex.
Can't wait for Season 5 to start!

Betty White and the ladies have wonderful chemistry together. Though this season does not have the consistency of previous seasons there are still enough funny moments to make this great viewing. Appearances by Carol Burnett and the ladies from Mary Tyler Moore Show are particularly noteworthy.
These four women together are outstanding and funny! Have all the season, love to watch them over and over again!
Hands down the best season yet, I can't wait for season five to start up, Betty White, Jane Leeves, Wendy Malick and Valerie Bertinelli, need you say more!?
I love this show, so was very glad to add it to my collection.  LIve in a very rural area and it is so easy to order from  Amazon instead of driving all over to find a store that carries it.

Very funny, the best part is you can start from any season because they bring you up to speed on the first episode.  Nothing is too much for them, it's kind of like a modern Golden Girls.  Love it, this show is one of my top shows!
I have all seasons and love them..  They are hilarious!  some of the moral standards I don't agree with but the comedy and acting is too funny not to watch.
OKay, so I watch Hot in Cleveland. It is a guilty pleasure. Sure it is the modern Golden Girls but no Beu Arthur and best of all it takes place in Cleveland, Ohio.

I have each series to date of this show, plus a multi Region DVD player.  Yet each DVD cuts out out half way through most of the episodes and moves to the start of the next episode.  None of my other Region One DVDs suffer in this way.  All avenues to correct explored but no luck.  Any advice would be welcome as the bits I can see are gently funny.
Everything these ladies do is fantastic!  Jane, Valerie, Wendie and, of course, Betty - it doesn't get much better than that!!
I have loved every season of this show and I love Betty White.  She is fantastic, but I doubt the show could continue with out her.

What's not to love about a sitcom with Betty White? The story is surprising, even in season 4, the girls are charming and the characters get clearer and mor substantial. I ordered all the DVDs to Germany because we don't get them here which is a shame! Maybe after another year they will discover this sitcom and also show it in Germany (hopefully!).

I am a big fan of Hot in Cleveland, these ladies are such a great ensemble cast that keeps the laughs coming while broaching difficult subjects.  Love, life and happiness while living single, sharing the ups and downs with friends, never looked better.
I bought this for a friend and I know she's been enjoying it.  I've watched the girls since the beginning.  I might just borrow the dvd's from her and rewatch them.

I'm a big fan of Jane Leeves, but have discovered a brilliant comedic cast in Hot in Cleveland! As Hot in Cleveland does not air in Australia, purchasing the series is my only option. It is a hilarious program, that allows us to see a little of our own idiosyncrasies in others. Laughter is the best medicine.
If it has Betty White in it, you know it's going to be good. Also has several other older actresses that are great!
This series just keeps getting better.  It's extremely witty and just good old fashioned fun.  I'd recommended it to everyone.
Love the series & look forward to many replays of the series episodes. Nothing like a little humor on these cold Winter nights.
This is a funny comedy show, and who does not love Betty White. The girls have such a good chemistry together.
Love this show!
Well unless a new season comes out this right here is the last season of a really cool sitcom! Everyone should have this in your collection! Its real funny baby!!

Hot In Cleveland has definitely hit its stride during its 4th season. Along with some fantastic guest stars visiting nearly every week, the scripts are stronger, funnier and more creative than ever. While I appreciate TV Land carrying this show, it deserves getting a wider audience on a major network. Kudos to the cast and staff of Hot In Cleveland! Thanks for the great season! Looking forward to Season 5!
Love the series
love hot in cleveland...great cast....great show
excellent
Great show. Well worth the money.
This Season was just as funny as the last! Loved it!
So funny!!! Love Betty White!
Love this show. !
Great follow-on to The Golden Girls.  All the cast members, especially Betty White, are terrific.
best seson ever!!
VERY GOOD
